title: ...è sempre affascinate!
text: Quando l'Olymiapark fu progettato per i XX Giochi olimpici del 1972, i progettisti avevano in mente un progetto a lungo termine e cos’ che l'Olympiapark è diventato una delle principali attrazioni turistiche di Monaco. Una buona prima tappa è l'Info-Pavilion, che ha informazioni, mappe, biglietti per il tour e un modello del complesso. Il personale noleggia anche lettori MP3 per un tour audio autoguidato.Il sito contiene una pista di pattinaggio, una piscina coperta, un quartiere residenziale e residenze studentesche e, naturalmente, lo Stadio Olimpico, che fu la sede del Bayern München, fino a quando non si trasferirono nella futuristica arena di Allianz nel 2006. Il sito olimpico fu costruito da Günther Behmisch, Frei Otto & Partners e divenne famoso in tutto il mondo soprattutto grazie alla futuristica costruzione del tetto simile a una tenda, che ancora affascina. La struttura è un  continuum che copre lo stadio olimpico, Olympiahall e la piscina. Il tetto che copre lo stadio principale è costituito da un tessuto in poliestere rivestito in PVC. Il grande parco olimpico di tre chilometri quadrati è unito alla città tramite la U-bahn (metropolitana). Situato vicino al centro città, fu costruito su un terreno utilizzato dall'esercito del Bayern fino al 1925, quando divenne parte dell'aeroporto di Monaco. Dopo la seconda guerra mondiale nel 1945, le macerie rimosse dalla città furono trasferite qui, formando la base del paesaggio collinare dell'Olympiapark. Se si vuole avere una buona panoramica del Villaggio olimpico, si può camminare fino alla cima della collina alta 60 metri nell' Olympiapark, nell' Olympiaberg oppure si può prendere l'ascensore per le piattaforme alte 189 e 192 metri sull'Olympiaturm , la torre della televisione alta 290 metri quando il cielo è limpido, avrai letteralmente Monaco ai tuoi piedi sullo sfondo la bellezza mozzafiato delle Alpi. Se trovi la piattaforma troppo ventosa, si può avere una vista sulla città di Monaco dal ristorante girevole nella torre. Dopo aver adempiuto al suo scopo per la celebrazione delle Olimpiadi del 1972, il parco è diventato un polmone verde per la città. È il luogo preferito dei cittadini di Monaco che cercano un posto dove passeggiare o correre e costituisce anche l'ambiente ideale per la celebrazione di diversi eventi musicali, sportivi, mostre e congressi.

text: الحديقة الاولمبية ميونخ هي واحدة من أجمل الاماكن السياحية في ميونخ والتي تؤمن للزائر واحدة من أمتع الأوقات الترفيهية وكذلك العديد من النشاطات التي تناسب جميع الأعمار.تقع الحديقة الأولمبية في ميونخ في منطقة سبيريدون لويس التي تعد من أشهر المناطق التي يقصدها عدد كبير من الزوار على مدار العام، وذلك من سكان المدينة والسياح المحليين والأجانب.وتحتوي الحديقة على العديد ملاعب الرياضات ، كملاعب تنس ومضمار جري ومسابح أولمبية وأماكن خاصة بالرياضات المائية، وكذلك أماكن خاصة بالرياضات الثلجية، كما وتحتوي الحديقة على مسرح كبير يقام فيه مجموعة من الحفلات الموسيقية لفرق موسيقية عديدة. ولا تتوقف حدود المتعة عند هذا وحسب، حيث أن المكان الذي توجد به الحديقة يؤمن لك العديد من المطاعم التي تقوم بإعداد أشهى واطيب وجبات الأطعمة الألمانية التقليدية، كما وهناك العديد من المقاهي التي تقدم ألذ أنواع المشروبات ضمن صالاتها التي تنعم بالجو الألماني الهادئ والمريح، حيث يمكنك الجلوس والتمتع بمشروبك المفضل بجانب إحدى أروع الأماكن الترفيهية التي يمكنك زيارتها في مدينة ميونخ الألمانية

title: Great place to explore
text: Easy access from the u bahn with well marked footpaths around the park. Plenty of places to eat and drink and explore. You can pop into the swimming pool complex and visualise the great olympians using the pools. The stadium was closed for an event but we were able to get a good view from the top of the olympiad tower.

title: Aria fresca
text: Parco molto pulito per una passeggiata , abbastanza organizzato per andare anche in bicicletta e respirare un po‘ di aria pulita dopo la monotonia e stress della città
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Perfektné miesto, ktoré sa oplatí navštíviť
text: Veľmi pekný park, s množstvom atrakcií. Vo vode sa síce plávať nedá, sú však k dispozicii vodné bicykle a loďky. Pri vode sa nachádzajú odtlačky rúk rôznych celebrít, ktoré v Olympiaparku mali koncerty. Zaujímavá architektúra, spojená s pekne upraveným parkom je skvelým spôsobom ako stráviť voľný čas. Oplatí sa vyjsť na Olympia Berg, čo je kopec nad Olympiaparkom, z ktorého je perfektný výhľad na celý park a na Mníchov. V čase našej návštevy tam boli aj kolotoče a stánky s jedlom.

title: Munich olympiapark
text: We didn’t have enough time to see everything but well worth a visit. We stayed nearby and went up the impressive elevator to the top of the needle. If in Munich I would go again

title: 1972 Olympic Gmes
text: Olympiapark was not so near the Nymphemburg Palace .To get there, we took the tram . On the way, we could see the beautiful autumn foliage .  There were not many people in sight because maybe it was Sunday. Fortunately, we met a young couple who live nearby and were taking along their little boy and baby to play in the park and they showed us a short cut to the Olympic Tower. The park itself was quite big and it was interesting to visit as this is the place where Mark Spitz won his 7 Olympic medals in swimming in the 1972 Olympic Games .

title: DET ER en STOR oplevelse.
text: Her er en smuk park, og selve turen op i tårnet tager under et minut.Udsigten hele vejen rundt er smuk og betagende. I godt vejr ses alperne. Prøv det !

title: Bel parco
text: Il Parco Olimpico è situato un po' in periferia della città, è un ampio spazio/polmone verde. Ci sono ristoranti e al centro la Torre Olimpica. E' tristemente ricordato per le Olimpiadi del 72 e per l'attacco terroristico di cui fu teatro

title: Traumaussicht um  Münschen bis zu den Alpen
text: Ein Muss für Besucher die die 1,5 Millionenstadt im Überblick von eine Höhe von über 180m Höhe genießen wollen. Der Hochfahrpreis von derzeit € 7,-- wird mit Traumausblicken bis zu den Alpen belohnt. Nicht übersehen darrf man die sehr guten Orientierungsbeschreibungen.

title: Schöner Park / einige Aktivitäten
text: im Sommer ist hier regelmäßig ein Kirmes und an unserem WE gab es ein Kinderfest - umsonst und draußen. Schön für Familien mit kleinen Kindern. Bei entweder oder würde ich allerdings den englischen Garten bevorzugen.

title: great walk around the park gets your legs working..
text: the view from the top of the hill is great, offering a 360 panorama of Munich. The cafe also serves excellent currywurst and fries. well worth a look around if your in the area. The park is adjacent to the BMW museum which is also worth a look for 10 euros

title: Nostalgie Nostalgie
text: Ja ja. Hier hat viel stattgefunden. Nicht nur die Spiele von Bayern München. Auch heute noch spürt man, wie die damals revolutionäre Architektur ein besondere Faszination ausübt. Und wer erinnert sich noch an die Olympiade 1972 und die Ermordung von jüdischen Sportlern? Daneben finden hier viele Konzert und Events statt. Und er Park ist eine grosse und ruhige Oase. in er man geruhsam einen schönen Tag geniessen kann. Hingehen!

title: Toll! Was für eine Anlage?
text: Wandern, spazieren,  mit Kindernwagen, alleine, laufen, nur sitzen, sich sportlich betätigen auch an Geräten draußen.....hier kann man alles machen. Und ist nie langweilig. Auch bei nicht so schönem Wetter. Auf jeden Fall muss man hingehen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Interesante opción lúdica.
text: Construido para los juegos olímpicos de Munich de 1972, hoy es un pulmón de más de 300 hectáreas de extensión.A pesar de los años transcurridos, resulta una obra de ingeniería de gran alcance  y de plena vigencia, gracias al diseño futurista de su cubierta que imita una tienda de campaña.Este inmenso parque verde dispone de instalaciones que incluyen un estadio olímpico, una pista de patinaje sobre hielo, una piscina cubierta, una pista de ciclismo, un anfiteatro, un acuario, un pabellón olímpico, una torre de televisión, un lago, senderos e incluso una capilla.Hoy es un amplio espacio de ocio, cultura y deporte, donde pocos se pueden imaginar que varias de las colinas existentes, surgieron después de la Segunda Guerra Mundial cuando muchos escombros y ruinas fueron amontonados en la zona.Se puede ascender a la torre y disfrutar de la amplia panorámica que ofrece por un módico precio o disfrutar del restaurante giratorio que alberga.Merece la pena recorrer este espacio y disfrutar del entorno con calma y tranquilidad.

title: Não perca
text: Munich é uma cidade ímpar, com milhares de atrações. Mas o parque olímpico é um lugar que vale a visita. Além de lindo e super bem preservado, é um lugar histórico, já que foi onde ocorreu o atentado terrorista nos Jogos Olímpicos de 72. Fácil de chegar, o metro deixa na porta do estádio. De manhã tem uma feira no estacionamento do parque, onde os locais vendem de tudo, de roupas a peças decorativas em prata. O parque é enorme e muito bonito. Vale levar a família toda.

title: pohodový park
text: příjemný park s terénními nerovnostmi a krásnými stadiony... pohodové dopoledne na sluníčku s procházkou kolem vody

title: Harika bir park
text: Yarım gün ayırmanız gerekir. Bmw müzesi ile aynı yerde. Metro ile ulaşım mümkün. Yeşili, maviyi ve yürümeyi seviyorsanız burası size göre..
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A visit to the old Olympic park.
text: I was pleased to see how well kept this area is after so many years.  Stroll around the different venues, see the lake and go to the top of the tower for a great view.  Of course they have a gift shop so stop there too.

title: Beautiful Grounds and a Lovely Walk
text: We took a stroll across the grounds of Olympiapark, taking in the sights and just enjoying the day. This would make a great place for a picnic, but we hadn't thought to pack one. It is really large, so you need a lot of time to cover it, but you can just stroll through as much as you like and catch a cab back to your hotel when you are done.

title: Excelente
text: De los mejores parques que conozco sino el mejor. Cuidado y limpio es paisajísticamente hermoso. Las construcciones deportivas son amigables con tanto verde y están muy bien integradas al medio ambiente. Destaco además el histórico Estadio Olímpico que aunque no es moderno es de todas formas bellísimo. Hay un sin fin de detalles que lo hacen interesante, entre ellos las huellas de las manos de estrellas de la música como Liza Minelli, Aerosmith, Roger Waters, REM y muchos otras. Están ubicadas y ordenadas al lado del lago a pocos metros del acuario.

title: EXCELLENT ATTRACTION
text: Visited the Olympic Park whilst on a weekend break to Munich. Well laid out and lots to see and do. Had excellent fun on the pedalo boat with our grandson (3+) steering much to everyone's delight. The site is very well maintained.

title: Viele Grünflächen, Wasser und tolle Aussicht vom Berg
text: Der Park ist mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln super zu erreichen. Neben den großen Grünflächen gibt es auch noch Spielplätze und Möglichkeiten um Sport zu treiben. Auch eine Wasseranlage ist vorhanden, bei der man viele und große Fische beobachten kann, die nicht menschenscheu sind. Man kann hier durch etliche grüne Wiesen spazieren. Wenn man Lust hat kann man noch den Berg hinaufsteigen und die wundervolle Aussicht auf ganz München genießen.

title: Promenade
text: Magnifique parc bercé d histoire. Espaces verts gigantesques et super confortables pour un moment de détente.

title: Good walk around the park!
text: Its near the BMW welt and spread over a bog area.. prepare to walk a lot ! has few restaurants too and a small lake

title: Sehr schön zur Kirschblüte
text: Zahlreiche Kirschbäume bieten eine traumhafte Kulisse im Frühling.Sehr gut geeignet für Spaziergänge.

title: Okay, Not Great
text: The review pretty much says it.  Going to the top of the tower is worthwhile.  Quick elevator ride and great views of the city, BMW, and the Olympic Park.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Fast 50 Jahre alt und immer noch toll
text: Der Olympiapark hat nach fast 50 Jahren noch nichts von seiner Faszination verloren finde ich. Hier kann man spazieren gehen, joggen oder einfach nur entspannen. Die Architektur mit dem Zeltdach ist immer noch einzigartig. Des Weiteren gibt es viel Freizeitangebote: Sealife, den Olympiaturm usw.

title: Schönes Gelände, Atmosphäre naja
text: Wir waren zum Eishockeyspiel des EHC in der Halle.Es war eine freundliche Atmosphäre, allerdings war es keine wirklich gute Stimmung und das obwohl der EHC einen Startrekord aufgestellt hat.Die Sicht war leider sehr schlecht, da wir im Block C in der zweiten Reihe saßen. Da wurde beim Verkauf der Tickets nicht darauf hingewiesen.

title: Lindo parque
text: Uma delícia de lugar para curtir o fim da tarde, andar de bike ou dar uma caminhada. Muito arborizado, com um lindo lago cheio de patinhos. Estádio e centro de treinamento de diversos esportes. Muito organizado. Diversas quadras de tênis. Espaço bom para toda a família.

title: Parco bellissimo
text: Usciti dal museo della BMW ci siamo diretti al Parco Olimpico che conserva un fascino e un'architettura ancora attualissima, seppur costruito negli anni '70. Vale spenderci un'oretta per rilassarsi un po' e staccarsi dal caos cittadino

title: After all these years it's still in great shape
text: Really impressed how almost 50 year old architecture is still in great shape, most Olympic venues are in disrepair, this one still looks new.

title: ΤΟ ΟΛΥΜΠΙΑΚΟ ΠΑΡΚΟ ΤΟΥ ΜΟΝΑΧΟΥ
text: Το ολυμπιακο παρκο του Μοναχου οπου εγιναν οι Ολυμπιακοι αγωνες του 1972. Τεραστιο παρκο να κανεις βολτα με τα ποδια η ποδηλατο. text: Το πάρκο αυτό, είναι πολύ ωραίο για βόλτα με τα ποδήλατα και το πάρκο έχει πολλές εκδηλώσεις Κάθε χρόνο.

title: פעילות ספורט או סתם סיור רגלי - מה שבא לכם
text: מקום נחמד לטיול רגלי, פיקניק או פעילות ספורט באגם של הפארק. אפשר לעלות על הגבע שממנה נשקפת תצפית מצויינת על רחבי הפארק. לגבע סיפור מעניין בפני עצמו, לפני שנבנה הפארק, הייתה במקום ערימת זבל ענקית שאותו ניצלו כדי לבנות את הגבע. תביאו עמכם קצת לחם או חטיפים אם בא לכם להאכיל ברווזים באגם. לא לשכוח לבקר באנדרטה צנועה לזכרם של 11 ספורטאים הישראלים שנרצחו באולימפיאדת מינכן ב 1972. ניתן למצוא את האנדרטה בקלות על גבי המפות המוצבות ברחבי הפארק תחת מספר 20.לכתבה המלאה חפשו בגוגל BUYGURU וכנסו לבלוג

title: Ich liebe es !
text: Bin Dort so oft vorallem im Sommer!Kann mir keinen besseren Ort zum chillen und spazieren vorstellen.Klar ist es meistens voll aber das ist nicht so schlimm.Kann ich jedem nur weiterempfehlen!

title: A village now a landmark
text: Various sports activities and the garden bear a tribute to the 1972 Olympic conducted here. A visit to this And BMW complements each other.

title: BELEZA E HISTÓRIA!
text: Atração imperdível para quem for a Munique. Esse parque é muito fácil de acessar pelo metro, próximo a fabrica da BMW. Vale um passeio de pelo menos meio dia para curtir os belos jardins, subir na torre, apreciar o estádio olímpico e comer nas barraquinhas! Recomendo!!!

title: eigentlich nur eine Menge Rasen um diverse...
text: ... Sportstätten; kein Eintritt und offensichtlich auch bei Einheimischen beliebt; es bietet sich an die kleine Rundfahrt mit der "Bimmelbahn" zu machen; kostet nur 3,50 € und man erfährt wenigstens, in welchem Gebäude was ist

title: Worth a visit on a good day
text: If you are interested in the more modern history of Munich then come see the Olympic Park on a good day. The stadia and associated buildings plus the parks outside are pleasant and interesting to see. Go on a good day

title: Mein Park direkt gegenüber....
text: ...der Oly-Park, Sport, Sommer-Kino, Musikevents, Konzerte innen und außen. Immer was los und absolut empfehlenswert!

title: Fantastic day out!
text: Well worth going to!  The tower itself has amazing views as far as the eye can see.  Lots of fun in the Rock Museum playing the jukebox, 5 songs for only 2 euros.  Plenty to do for all ages on a sunny day!

title: Lots to see and to take in
text: The Olympiapark is nice and spacious and very walkable. The stadium itself was small but I figure the games were not so popular back then. There are lots of activities during the weekends and glad to see a lot of youth participants being very active in sports.

title: Attractive park
text: A big, nice and attractive park which has been built for Munich olampic games. The olampic tower. Olampic stadiums ,attlete residents are all can be seen in the park.

title: 风景很美 空气很好

title: The most beautiful olympic park I've ever seen.
text: Munich's beautiful Olympic Park, home of the 1972 summer games. Sports facilities are very well maintained, a must visit to the Stadium. Inside the park you can see the beautiful TV tower.

title: A must
text: Great place to spend some time to get a glimpse of Olympic history. Good place to get out and walk about.

text: We enjoyed seeing this Olympic park as we have alsoSeem them kn Beijing, Barcelona We and here.  The entire park is worth a visit!

title: Mooi park
text: Vandaag het park bezocht. Mooi en rustig park waar veel hardlopers gebruik van maken.Lekker rustgevend

title: un grand parc
text: Un très grand parc olympique avec de magnifiques infrastructures biens entretenus.On peut même prendre un petit train pour faire le tour et ou faire du pédalo.Propre et paisible

text: Groot park, gemakkelijk bereikbaar met de metro. Er waren verbouwingswerkzaamheden en na enig zoeken vonden we toch een restaurant. Indrukwekkend  en huiveringswekkend om het verhaal te lezen over de gijzeling tijdens de Olympische spelen.

title: A Piece of History to Experience
text: I never thought I’d get to see this incredible architectural site. Although closed to walk around, we paid to enter, walked the grounds (swim hall was in reconstruction) and had a nice  lunch in  their restaurant, which was way more than sports pub food type fare.

title: Muito interessante!
text: O parque olímpico é uma local cheio de atrações e um excelente passeio na cidade de Munique. No dia que visitei, estava tendo um ensaio do show do Dire Straits numa arena. Festa, tipo um festival de verão, em outra área. O parque oferece muitas áreas verdes, espaços para crianças, além da torre, por exemplo, cuja subida é obrigatória para quem quer ter uma visão aérea de Munique.

title: Great break from the city
text: Loved this park and great on a sunny day. Lots to do, Olympic Tower, Walk around the stadium, Olympic Village, and also check if there are any events on.before you go. At the top of the tower or the hill opposite you get the best views of Munich and Perfect sunset views. Highly recommended,

title: Best of Munich
text: M U N C H E N  ❤️🇩🇪..A must visit Park, The Olympic Park..Highly recommended to visit this Park during your trip to Munich and a 360 Degree panoramic view of Munich is highly recommended from the top of the tower.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A good one for a 1st time to Munich
text: The day we went, there were no tour options. So we just bought tickets for the sightseeing option. But maybe the tour would be more informative and more to see (I’m not sure) It was alright and nice to do as a first time to Munich and maybe on the way to the BMW welt/museum since you’re anyway in the area. We just saw the main stadium, walked around the park, checked out the Munich Walk of Fame (which was nice to see) and that was that...

title: Incredible engineering from the 1970's
text: Spent the morning here before returning home from holiday, have to say was very impressed by the condition that the area is still in.  There is an exhibition/memorial area where you can read and watch the events that took place at the 1972 olympics.  Its incredibly moving to read the stories of the struggles that some of the Israeli athletes/trainers went through before loosing their lives so tragically.  The area is very well used and there are events on - check the itinerary.

title: Amazing metal web
text: Incredible architectural picture. This Olympic stadium looks like a huge beautiful web, made in a stylish, modern, angular/sharp style and scattered across a large territory of the entire Olympic park, and not just in some piece, but in a wavy shapes. The case when the task of building simple stadium was approached with love for the work and creativity. It deserves high respect.

title: Historisch
text: Der Park unter dem Olympiaturm erinnert an die olympischen Spiele  1972. Schön angelege Spazierwege mit viel Grün.

title: Olympiapark München - ein Muss für jeden München Besucher !
text: Olympiapark München - ein Muss für jeden München Besucher !Meine Mädels und ich besuchen regelmäßig den Olympiapark in München, ein perfekter Ort zum verweilen und entspannen, aber auch zum neu entdecken. Regelmäßige Aktionen frischen das ganze Thema noch auf.Unbedingt besuchen und sich Zeit nehmen !

title: Nice place to visit
text: We really enjoyed our visit to the Olympia Park. We took the little train around the park, we went up the tower, great view from up there
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 大公園
text: 原來慕尼黑舉辦奧林匹克運動會已經是1972年，我們去到的時候人跡晞少，有些當地建築工人在舖草皮，有些人去游泳館游泳，附近是一個大公園，去完BMW博物館可以過來看看。

title: Andreas Gabalier und Bon Jovi 2019 immer wieder
text: Wir waren zu Andreas Gabalier im Juni und zu Bon Jovi im JuliMan muss es einfach erlebt haben, immer wieder gerneJedoch gab es bei Gabalier in Front on Stage bereich keine Toiletten, hier zu hätten wir durch den ganzen Innenraum, dann die Treppe hoch bis zum Ausgang laufen sollen, dies ist für mich unerklärlich...Bei Bon Jovi und auch bei Gabalier waren die Ordnungshütter sehr unfreundlich...

title: Un grand parc animé, agréable du matin au soir
text: La vue sur la ville est magnifique du haut des collines et le parc est animé par une petite fête foraine le soir.Biergarten, jogging, relaxation,promenade tout le monde peut apprécier le parc

title: Paseo Agradable
text: Gran zona verde muy cuidada con un lago ( en el que puedes alquilar una barca). Tienes opción de llegar en metro y una vez allí, visitar el museo de BMW, subir a la torre, entrar a visitar el estadio olímpico sede de las olimpiadas de 1972 que está bien conservado pero se nota el paso de los años.

title: Awesome park and tower
text: This was one of the best places in town. A really must-go if you are in Munich. Everything is very well-preserved, and the tower climb is really worth it (much better than in other towns I went to).

title: Lugar precioso
text: Un lugar precioso para visitar y pasear. El verde del paisaje, el lago donde habitan patos, ocas y cisnes, lo bien cuidado y conservado que está todo y unas vistas espectaculares hacen de este lugar un sitio maravilloso donde pasear.

title: Endroit idéal pour respirer
text: Très joli parc avec ces stades, son lac, sa tour, etc...Des petites collines ont été aménagées afin de profiter de la vue du parcParc assez vaste, on y met du temps pour faire le tour Vous trouverez de petites restaurations Mémorial des attentats de 1972 Possibilité de monter dans la tour pour admirer le tout MunichMusée BMWVous y passerez une excellente journéeDepuis le centre de Munich (Marienplatz) prendre le métro U3

title: bel parco cittadino
text: Bel parco cittadino, ma andateci solo se volete passare una mezza giornata nel verde sennò, come è successo a me , perdete solo tempo e soldi per il parcheggio ( € 5,00 ) . title: Beautiful. Perfect for a romantic stroll or day out with the kids.
text: This park makes you forget that you're in the middle of a city until you get to the top of the hill and see the wonderful cityscape all around you.  With fun to be had in the water, on the grass or at one of many food/beer stands, it's a winner for any family or a great day solo.  Even if you've only got a few days in Munich, this is a stop not to miss- and the hill climb is TOTALLY worth it!

title: Visited with late teen kids to see what was there
text: Driven past this many times from the airport, but never stopped, Our visit was to the tower mainly and the 181 restaurant, The park is very well kept and offers a wide number of attractions for all ages, including rowing boats on the lake. Views from the tower over munich are amazing

title: Ro og fred i smukke omgivelser
text: Besøg parken for at opleve tårnet og de skulpturelle stadionfaciliteter. Et historisk sted, hvor der er masser af plads og dejligt roligt.

title: Falily trip
text: Μια βόλτα στο Ολυμπιακό Πάρκο του Μονάχου(το 1972 έγιναν εδώ οι Ολυμπιακοί Αγώνες) πραγματικά αξίζει να την κάνετε,θα αποζημιωθείτε.Υπάρχει κι εμπορικό κέντρο για βόλτα στα μαγαζιά.

title: Olympijský park
text: Park kde se konaly v roce 1972 Olympijské hry a jenž nechvalně proslul únosem a vraždou několika izraleských sportovců. Dnes už to je jedna z hlavních turistických atrakcí v Mnichově. Můžete zde navšívit Olympijsou věž či halu anebo také malý amfiteátr, který mi přišel moc pěkný. Určitě se zde konají i nejrůznější koncerty a kulturní akce.

title: Parco cittadino immenso
text: Leggermente alla perifieria di Monaco, ma facilmente raggiungibile con il trasporto urbano, sorge il parco olimpico, realizzato per le tristemente famose Olimpiadi del 1972. Molto bello e pulito, si gira a piedi (ci vuoel un po' di tempo, data l'estensione). ci sono dei laghetti con al possibilità di noleggiare i pedalò, tenso strutture che coprono i vari locali per lo sport. Al centro del parco c'è la torre olimpica. Sono presenti punti di ristoro.

title: Metallica Konzert
text: Opympiapark muss man erlebt haben . optimale Anbindung an öffentliche Verkehrsmittel . Sehr saubere und gepflegte Anlage

title: Schön aber mühsam
text: Ein sehr schöner und historischer Ort. Mit Kindern jedoch nur eingeschränkt zu empfehlen da das Gelände sehr weitläufig ist ohne dass man sehr viel unternehmen kann.

title: Metallica Gig
text: What an Stadium! Sound, Effects Atmosphere, all boxes ticked, Amazing Gig. Very well run no messing around, post Gig quick walk back through Park on to a Train. BMW Museum is just across Road too, if you come early. Highly recommend seeing a Gig here!

title: If your into Sports its worth the distance
text: First off , if you decide to go see the park, make sure you take the direct underground route to the park, Otherwise like me you face a 30 Min. walk . Once you get there you can take a self guided tour of the arena for about 5 euro. During the warm months there is a carnival on the grounds with everything but fool the guesser. Also a bier garten that serves basic food needs also .

title: Buenas vistas y ambiente
text: Desde la torre se pueden obtener muy buenas vistas, ademas por la tarde es un paseo obligado ya que cuando fuimos había parque de diversiones y food trucks

title: Curioso
text: A estrutura é bem diferente. Ele é muito grande, com opções de lanchonetes, ótimo para uma corrida ou passar um tempo admirando o lago e a paisagem. As crianças vão adorar.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Still hanging high !
text: Amazing architectural imaginations and structures, even after all these decades !  We spent some hours here. Nice partks around as well !

title: Einfach nur schön
text: Diverse Stunden im Olympiapark verbracht.Hier kann man ausgiebige Spaziergänge inmitten der Natur machen. Wirklich eine top Location an welcher man viele tolle Fotos schießen kann.Nicht zu vergessen ist der Ort auch noch historisch.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Rimembranza
text: Teatro di uno degli attentati che hanno letteralmente cambiato il mondo. Da vedere per ricordare e meditare

title: Olympstadion
text: Very beautiful and impressive place to walk through. Olympic park is huge and full of different activities.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Parco stupendo
text: Esprime la capacità tedesca di far bene le cose. Parco realizzato da decenni ma vivo ed attuale come se fosse stato realizzato da poco. Siamo capitati in un periodo fortunato con giostre e giochi all'aperto, atmosfera bellissima. Ma comunque sarebbe stata una piacevole passeggiata lo stesso.

title: Ein toller Park im Grünen
text: Hier im Olympiapark kann man sich treiben lassen, die Natur genießen und an einem der vielen Hänge den Blick ins Tal schweifen lassen

title: Very unusual
text: Stayed close by and spent a day in the park...nice and relaxing, but there are activities to do. Great for cycling, walking, chilling with a drink and food on a nice day....would revisit...
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful spaces
text: Brief visit for the second time but beautiful and peaceful setting, definitely worth the trip out of the city

title: De moeite waard
text: Zeker de moeite waard. Je kan er verschillende activiteiten doen, waterfietsen, stadion bezoeken, ... Ook het uitzicht op de stad vanaf olympiaberg is een aanrader.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Agréable
text: La promenade dans ce qui fut le complexe olympique en 1972 est agréable. On y apprécie de se poser sur une pelouse aux abords des infrastructures dont l'architecture était si avant-gardiste. Durant les mois d'été, un festival gratuit anime le tout en plus de la fête foraine.

title: Uma jóia na cidade.
text: Excelente área de lazer e para a pratica de atividades ao ar livre, aproveite para subir a torre e conhecer toda Munique, vista de cima.

title: a faire pour la mémoire
text: L'entrée à ce parc n'est pas très onéreux mais au delà du stade, dont vous avez l’accès libre en tribune, il n'y a pas grand chose à voir. Le stade est en manque d’entretien, tout comme le reste. Vous pouvez moyennent un supplément monter sur le toit et faire le tour de cette couverture. Il existe également une tyrolienne pour traverser le stade. Le passage dans les entrailles du stade n'est pas non plus gigantesque. Bref, à voir pour prendre l'air ...mais un jour de beau temps

title: Not the best experience
text: There is a charge for parking seems to be €5 and a €3.50 charge to enter the stadium seating area. There is a very steep ascent to the viewing area which is not possible in a self propelled wheelchair - fortunately I have a very fit husband who enjoyed the challenge! As I have a disability I had to show my card and that gave me reduced entry for myself, €3 and it was free for the carer. Not something explained but at the pay booth I showed my card and they then gave me the reduced rate. Another thing we discovered was that the parking is also free for those with the Blue badges, you put your ticket into a disabled pay meter and then at the exit barrier, press the call button m show your card to the camera and he opens the barrier. Quite a saving. Food was not great, the coffee hardly worth the €3.40 charge. But again, on exit we found a cafe by the tennis courts and the food there looked good and reasonable too. The coffees looked to be much better value at €2.50 or €2.90 a cup.It’s a good place for children as there is an area with Log Water rides, a big Wheel and quite a few entertainment stalls. We would go again but only to watch the tennis and have something to eat and drink in the attached cafe.

title: Vaut le déplacement
text: Le parc olympique des jeux d'été de 1972 se visite et vaut le coup d'oeil. Le parc et ses infrastructures sont très bien entretenus. On peut simplement se promener dans l'immense parc, profiter des différents points de vue et découvrir de plus près les musées à proximité (BMW, sealife, rockmuseum…). Une fête foraine est installée au cœur du village olympique et des points de restauration sont présents. Le site est desservi par le métro et les bus, il est préférable de ne pas s'y rendre en voiture.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mon gros coup de coeur avec la Marienplatz
text: Le site est tout simplement somptueux. Autant de verdure dans une grande ville, c'est génial !Vous pourrez y passer la journée tant il est étendu.La couleur vert est omniprésente ! C'est apaisant et de toute beauté !Pensez aux vélos si vous pouvez et au pique-nique !

title: Olympiaturm
text: Mega Aussicht über München ...Top Empfehlung. ....Olympiapark und Turm in München  Gute gastronomische Versorgung
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Olympijský park
text: Docela pěkné místo, ničím mě neuchvátilo, ale na Německo dobrý. :) Doporučuji koupit si vstup na věž i do BMW muzea. Kolotoče pro děti dobré, spoustu stánků s dobrotami nebo i oblečením. Krásné jezírko. Chválím atmosféru - jako u  moře.Co mi přijde divné je, že se u atrakcí a stánků nedá platit kartou, při jejich přílivu turistů a cenách si myslím, že by to bylo na místě. Záchody ve věži odporné. Radím na tom zapracovat, ale všude v Německu je to s toaletami velká bída!

title: Beautiful views from the tower
text: A huge area to cover at the Olympia park... lush greenery as well as with a good pond area with ducks floating around & few food trucks & some play tents for kids... the trip to the top of the tower was exciting... the elevator took us to 185Mtrs high observation deck... as you walk around the area, one can opt to walk behind glass or else climb up one level for a open area as well, but since it’s on a height it can be quite windy... beautiful views of Munich & the Olympia Park..The elevator also stops at 181Mtrs where there is a high end restaurant & has few options for brunch, high tea, lunch & dinner... with prices ranging from €60/- for a 3 course meal to €76/- for a 4 course meal... dress code smart causal...

title: Parco per grandi e piccoli
text: Il parco è fantastico ....ci siamo stati per un giro turistico e siamo rimasti meravigliati per l organizzazione, gli spazi per grandi e piccoli e le attività....dalle giostre alle barchette  per fare il giro sui laghetti....Abbiamo anche fatto uno spuntino in uno dei tanti posti di ristoro

title: Visite en famile
text: Tres joli parc, il est agréable de s'y promener et la vue depuis la tour... juste magnifique! Un incontournable de Munich

title: Beautiful, eventful, great views
text: We were there in the pouring rain, but there was a summer event going on with a cure market. So lots of things happening but still not crowded. It was grear being able to walk into the stadium for photos. The viewpoint gave great views of the area and Münich. The weather didn’t impede us too much, we still did most of it (skipped the tower because of fog). The walk of stars was a fun quirky addition.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un parco olimpico per amico
text: Questo parco immenso é bellissimo e ospitale, a parte tutte le strutture sportive che ospita come palaghiaccio, piscina, stadio, Halle per concerti etc, é immerso nel verde in modo ampio, contiene un super lago ed é veramente un grande respiro di natura.Per me Super!

title: Great Walk, nature and architecture
text: Beautiful and huge park, plenty of space to stroll, ride your bike, jog or simply sit down and enjoy the views. The stadium and all buildings from the Olympics are still impressive and cool to look at.

title: A ne pas rater !
text: Vaut le détour pour la superbe vue du haut du parc sur la ville et sur le site olympique et au loin sur l'Arena ce qu'ont apprécié nos ados!Lieu idéal pour finir la journée avec un détour par la fête foraine où l'on a trouvé de quoi se restaurer.

title: Muy recomendable.
text: Es una de las visitas casi obligatorias si vas a Múnich, pasar una mañana visitando la zona olímpica y subiendo a la torre, desde la cual se tienen unas vistas espectaculares. Destacar que se trata de una zona muy bien cuidada, con unos parques muy bonitos.

title: Stojí za návštěvu
text: Celý olympijský park je poměrně rozlehlý a můžete zde strávit také dost času. Rychlejší variantou může být návštěva věže, kde Vás do 192 m doveze výtah. Na dnešní poměry to není žádná extra výška, ale na druhou stranu je to za 9 EUR hezká podívaná nejen na olympijský park, ale i na budovy BMW a další části Mnichova. Ten z výšky vypadá dost zeleně a velmi hezky.

title: Schöner Blick auf München
text: Der Olympiapark ist immer einen Besuch wert. Vor allem das im Sommer stattfindende Tollwood-Festival bietet einen tollen Anlass den Park zu besuchen. Zusätzlich gibt es einen schönen Ausblick auf die Stadt.

title: Mooi om stadion van boven te bekijken!
text: Vanaf de heuvel mooi uitzicht op dakconstructies stadion. Op het moment dat wij er waren was er een soort kermis.

title: Giant complex with stuff to do
text: There was a fair going on when we visited is, but you can go wakeboarding there and just check out the old olympic park from 1972. Perfect to go there by bike

title: No ha pasado el tiempo.
text: El Olympiapark de Munic se encuentra excelentemente conservado, y han sabido transformar las instalaciones para seguir manteniendo-las con vida. Muy recomendable pasear entre las inmensas zonas verdes, muy concurridas. >Lástima que no pudimos entrar a visitar el estadio olímpico.

title: Bei gutem Wetter - nichts wie hin!
text: Da das Wetter bei uns super mitgespielt hat, hatten wir einen wundervollen Tag im Olympiapark. Auf dem Weg zum eigentlichen Park gibt es unter anderem den BMW-Vierzylinder und das BMW-Museum als Sightseeing-Spots abzuhaken.Sehr grün, sehr schön, viel Platz mit Familie und Kids um dort zu spazieren und einige Attraktionen gab es bei uns zur lokalen "Kirmes" auch. Im Olympia-Restaurant ist die Auswahl der Speisen nicht supergroß, aber sie sind gut.

title: Un après-midi cool
text: Endroit vraiment sympathique au cœur de Munich pour installer son pique-nique, jouer en plein air, manger une glace et visiter le stade olympique chargé d'histoire du monde et de football !

title: Spaziergänge bei Sonnenuntergang
text: Dieser Ort eignet sich hervorragend für einen Spaziergang. Vom Olympiaberg aus, kann man einen wundervollen Sonnenuntergang beobachten.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful walk
text: Amazing park with lot of attractions for children a d adults. Restaurants, pubs, museums, lake, places to sport... All on one spot and really worth visiting.

title: Great walk
text: The parc itself is very beautiful and there is a small lake in the middle as well with ducks and fish. There was a small luna park with rides, food and games stalls. There is also a train ride for just €3.50 but doesn't show you much.

title: PERFECTAMENTE MANTENIDA LA INSTALACION DE LAS OLIMPIADAS
text: Han mantenido perfectamente las instalaciones de las Olimpiadas,transformando estas en viviendas y en un parque urbano,merece la pena dar una vuelta y contemplar lo que fue y lo que es,está junto a la sede BMW

title: Schön zum spazieren
text: Schöne Anlage um den Oly-Turm, die Eishalle, das Oly-Stadium usw herum. Man kann dort schön mit Kindern oder Hunden spazieren gehen.In der Mitte befindet sich auch ein Teich. Im Sommer befindet sich das Tollwood in unmittelbarer Nähe.

title: Incredible views over Munich.
text: For 9 euros, get the lift to the top - 192 metres. The lift journey is an experience in itself. The views across Munich from the tower are amazing - overlooking the Olympic Stadium and the Olympic village as well as all of Munich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Die Herrentoiletten im Olympaistadion habe mich an 40 Jahre Sozialismus erninnert!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
text: Ich war am Freitag im Pink Konzert und war fassungslos wie die Toiletten ausgesehen haben!!!!!!! Ein Vertreter der Firma Villeroi & Boch wenn das sehen würde, der würde sofort einen Trupp schicken die den Firmennamen entfernen!!!!!!!!!!! Das hat mit deutscher Sauberkeit nichts zu tun, das ist nur eine riesen Blamage für eine selbst ernannte "Weltstadt mit Herz (Schmutz) !!!!!!!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Muhteşem
text: Şehrin içinde devasa bir park içinde bir yer.içinde olimpia statı var.kuleye asansör ile çıkılabiliyor.şehri 360 derece görme imkanı bulabiliyorsunuz.çıkış için aile ücreti 21 Euro.içinde minik bir göl ve minik bir lunapark var çocuklarla keyifli bir zaman geçirilecek bir yer.karşısı bmw ayrıca seaworld de var.tren ile dolaşılabiliyor.

title: Nice parc, great venue stadium, but with toilet issue
text: The parc is nice, the Olympic stadium a great venue for music events.One issue: way to little toilets so expect long rows. So go elsewhere before the start of the event or don't drink to much beer.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Yeşilin her tonu
text: Olimpiapark hem çok yeşil hem eğlenceli bir yer. isterseniz bisiklet kiralayıp içerisinde keyifli vakit geçirebilirsiniz. kuleye tırmanıp münih manzarası yapabilirsiniz ama biz yapamadık çünkü kapalıydı. o gün orada bir parti verileceği için o bölüm kapanmıştı.İlk girişte marketten ihtiyaçlarınızı alıp yada evde hazırladığınız yiyeceklerinizi çimlerin üstüne oturarak yiyebilirsiniz. parkın bir bölümünde hafta sonları çeşitli yiyecek ve giysilerin olduğu bir pazar yer alıyor.Gitmişken oradanda alışveriş yapabilirsiniz.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful park, great place for a run
text: Visited this park many times. Check out the Sommertollwood festival if you visit during the summer, good music, good food, good beer. I mostly used this park for runs, it's an amazing place. Remember to go to the top of the Olympiaberg and enjoy the view.

title: Věž
text: Bohužel jsem tam byla ve špatném počasí, viditelnost malá. Přesto to stálo za to, je vysoko a viděla jsem aspon celý olympijský park.

title: Anche il tennis
text: Il Olympiapark di Monaco di Baviera è davvero un posto stupendo pieno di verde, piste ciclabili, attrazioni allo stadio ed all'Olympia Halle.E ci sono anche 22 campi da tennis per gli appassionati.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A fun day
text: During one of our afternoons in Munich, we took a walk through Olympiapark and are so glad we did. We say many different wildlife, people, and activities during our walk. You will also get amazing views and photo opportunities.

title: Vistas espectaculares
text: Pasear por este complejo, recordar el ambiente olímpico, ver el museo BMW, subir a la torre de comunicaciones para contemplar vistas panorámicas de Múnich y alrededores es una experiencia encantadora. Además en julio se celebra la "fiesta de verano", muy animada en la tarde-noche.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Auf dem Weg zum Tollwood
text: Wie immer schön und sehenswert! Allerdings würde der künstliche Teich mal eine Reinigung vertragen, da er sehr stark verschmutzt war!

title: Unexpected festival
text: We were visiting the BMW museum and stumbled across a festival at Olympia Park. We had a fantastic evening here drinking beer, eating pretzels and watching Kim Wilde and German bands we’d never heard of but enjoyed just the same. The festival ended with a half hour firework display which was incredible.The park itself is worth a visit just to sit and chill by the lake on a hot day. It’s great that this place is still being used and enjoyed.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Not something special
text: Its not something special but I found it okThe price is 9eyros. i think  5eyros its ok9eyros its expensive for the view and the service!!

title: Activities!
text: Went here for the Tollwood market and walked by the tower and museum. Great way to spend an afternoon with lots of delicious food. It gets packed at night so better to come during the day.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Magnifique parc
text: Très bel endroit à visiter, vous avez le choix entre la tour Olympique, le stade Olympique, vs promenez dans le parc.Le SeaLife et le musée BMW à côté.Renseignez-vous avant la visite, car en cas d'événement, la visite du stade est limitée.

title: Ideal para hacer deporte.
text: Fuimos a ver el festival de verano y la aglomeración de gente hizo que no pudiéramos disfrutarlo. Por lo demás, sus numerosos carriles y circuitos lo hacen ideal para hacer deporte o pasear en bici.

title: A nice day
text: It’s a nice park to go to to reminisce about old times. It was a lovely day with a gentle breeze. We went to the top of the tower for a wonderful panoramic view of the city. And then walked and walked and walked all over the park. A very relaxing day
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great park and definite place to visit - Tower was the highlight
text: We visited for 3 reasons; 1)BMW museum, 2)Olympiaturm (tower) and 3)Park and Olympic history, and all three far over delivered compared to expectation.  For us this was a great visit and great day.  The tower was really the only attraction we came to see.  Of course seeing the Olympic stadium and former home of Bayern Munich was good but the draw was the tower and park.  I was the only member of my family that took on the hill on the other side of the lake and I was rewarded with some great views.  If exercise is not a problem for you, I highly recommend this hill, good exercise with great views of Downtown Munich and the park.  Again, it was simply neat to be where the Munich Olympics occurred with all of their history.

title: A great visit.
text: The best part of the visit, in addition to the unique architecture of the Olympic Stadium, is the Olympic Tower.  It gives you a great view of the whole park and the BMW buildings nearby.  It is a very popular destination, with both tourists and locals making it a busy park.

title: Don’t visit, unless you’re here for a concert
text: Nice park if you’re a local. There are trampolines, bungee chords, paddle boats, put put, indoor soccer arena. As a visitor the tower and Olympic park are interesting. Personally, i enjoy this place, but as a tourist there’s plenty of other things

title: Olympic Tower
text: Definitely recommend vising the observation deck and also lunch in the revolving restaurant in the tower---breathtaking views of Munich and excellent food!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Fantastic place
text: Builtet for the Munich Olympic games. A great stadium and park and lots of other activities you do there. The closed Olympic is for concerts and other events and the Olympic stadium 🏟 for games all year round and concerts held during summer

title: Een fraai park.
text: Natuurlijk roept het Olympiapark op de eerste plaats herinneringen op aaneen triest gebeuren in het verleden. Daar zagen we niets van terug. Wel een ruim en prachtig park met zijn vele stadions en zijn toren, waarin we natuurlijk even naar boven gingen. Fraai overzicht over park en stad.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bon Jovi & Def Leppard Gig
text: Wow, we loved every minute of being here. The park is huge and also houses the BMW headquarters which has a v interesting museum.  The stadium is massive and housed 30000 people.  We had a great time!

title: Ottima location per i grandi eventi
text: Sono stata allo stadio Olimpico diverse volte per concerti, recentemente per Bon Jovi e Def Leppard. Organizzazione impeccabile, acustica fantastica, metro vicina, molti punti di ristoro, bagni puliti, staff ben preparato a gestire al meglio grandi eventi e tutta la gente che vi prende parte. Attendere l’apertura dei cancelli in questo bel parco è sempre piacevole. Ho visto concerti in parecchi stadi ma l’Olimpico di Monaco è quello che preferisco. Ci tornerò sicuramente!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Olympics Once Again
text: The visit to Olympic towere gave us a Birds Eye View of Munich. We were lucky to have clear sky and hence were able to have a wonderful unrestricted view of Munich.The ticketing process was simple and going up the Olympic Tower was very streamlined.

title: Olympic Park
text: The Games village developed for Munich Olympic is worth a visit. There is a tower which you can go to by a elevator. There is a lake which is beautiful and there are mobile restaurants and a beer bar near the lake. There is swimming pool area and a area  for kids games practice .
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful and relaxing
text: Very nice nature, calming,  good to relax. I was there in the hot summer, and many trees to relax in the shades

title: a noble old lady in munich
text: This park is almost 50 years old and hosted the soccer worldcup and the olympic games back in the 70ies. Today it is used as a venue for concerts and other events like the tollwood-festival. Even if there is no event, you can just take a walk in this big park. It is n typical tourist attraction, but worth a visit.

title: تستحق الزياره وبقوة
text: اقترح زيارتها وبقوه اذا كنت حوالين ميونخفيها فعاليات كثيرة في الصيفتستطيع ركوب القوارب دخول السينما في الهواء الطلق وتجلس على كراسي تشبه كراسي البحر وسعر التذكره يتراوح ما بين 8€ الى 12€كان هناك مهرجان غذائي لمدة شهر داخل الحديقة

title: Interesting place
text: With the metro stop just a 5 minute walk away, the grounds around the Olympic park are very pretty.  Outdoor soccer, indoor soccer, swimming, track and field, ice skating etc. venues from the 1972 Olympic games available to see.  Also the Olympic Village, which is now a private housing area.  It is free just to walk around.Aat the top of the tower (which costs 9 Euro to go up), were exhibits explaining the 1972 tradegy.  17 died as a result of a terrorist attack.   Such a sad event.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: super place
text: very beautiful place and clean. walking through the small lakes amazing. lots of things and places to see

title: Toller Park
text: Wunderbar angelegter Park mit vielen Verweilmöglichkeiten. Ein See und eine Bühne mit abwechselnden Events laden zum Abschalten ein.

title: Neat experience!
text: While in Munich, we had the opportunity to stop and walk around the grounds.  If you have time, enjoy a ride to the top of the needle for a spectacular view of the surrounding area.

title: Phenomenal views - worth the price on a clear day
text: The food was really good and the service attentive but the real attraction, of course, is the panoramic view from the restaurant. In my opinion, the price was well worth the experience. If you're going to go, then please consider window seating. Our experience was on a crystal clear day so the panoramic view was for miles in every direction. This would NOT be worth the price on a cloudy/overcast day.

title: Nice green are with many activities
text: Impressive grounds and architecture as well as lush green areas and ponds + nice tower to ascend to (9 euros p.p or 20 for family ticket) and also an olympic schwimmhalle which was being renovated at the time of visit but still very nice. Beautiful and very nice sauna area (with this day very bad aufguss every hour). Lots of other activities and tours that we didn't try, this place is well worth a visit!

title: Iconic destination
text: Visted here on Whit Sunday for a stroll and a trip up the tower before we left München for our drive to Rothenburg. I had visited around twenty years ago when working at the local BMW plant and couldn't wait to return....We had bought something to eat and drink at a local deli and so sat down on one of the many benches and watched the world go by....Such an iconic place with amazing modern architecture. Once sated it was then to the tower for the very fast ride to the top...and yes our ears did pop at the speed...for the stunning views over this fantastic city and surroundings...8 euros well spent......Highly recommend.

title: Historic site
text: We took the hop on/hop off bus to the Olympic Park which is one of the best ways to get there. There is the BMW museum nearby, but we are not that interested in cars so went straight to the park.  We didn’t go into the stadium itself but growing up watching the 72 Olympics and 74 World Cup it was great to see the iconic structure. We visited the memorial to the Israeli athletes nearby where they show a short film on the events surrounding the tragedy, it is very respectful and well presented. We also visited the nearby tower (for 9 Euros each) which gives you a great birds eye view of the city and surrounding area. The best thing about the tower is that two of the three observation points are open so you can get plenty of pictures without the glare of the window reflecting.There is a restaurant near the top of the tower if you wish to eat. I would recommend a trip to the park and the tower is a must visit when there.

title: Nice relaxing place

title: Up The Tower

Bear in mind you have to pay for going up the tower as well as some other parts too.The park has nice rolling hills in it and a boating pond. title: Great Concert
text: Came here to see Rammstein play in their home country at this iconic venue so I thought I'd share some observations of my experiences to others who may be thinking of investing in a journey here.  I'll try and segment this so it makes sense:Getting there:You know, for an attraction like this that can, and does, draw huge crowds, it's not massively easy to get to. The nearest U-Bahn station is half-mile away although, if the weather is nice you can opt for another station that allows you a walk through the park.  This is quite a nice option and we were fortunate enough to have the weather to allow us to do this.Pre-Show:When you walk in through the park you enter directly in a large open area.  The pre-concert atmosphere was outstanding and the merchandise/refreshment stalls were laid out very well.  There could have been more seating but most people found spaces on the grass or just sat on the ground.  There was an excellent selection of food and refreshments on hand and, for Munich at least, they weren't too badly priced.  I was really impressed with how the toilets were kept clean and functional as there was literally a constant stream of people heading down the steps and another heading back up.  There must have been 80,000 people attending the concert and things kept running smoothly.People management/crowd control.Oh dear.  Getting in to your seating block was a nightmare as was getting out.  I appreciate that the stewards were doing what they could but whatever idiot decided to put food and drink stands at the sides of the areas where such massive numbers  of people had to pass through should really have his/her backside kicked.  People were queuing in these areas and/or just milling around drinking.  This was bloody silly and pretty dangerous.  The presence of these stalls also prevented quick egress from the venue, not just for the previous reason but also because they stopped barriers being removed that could have allowed crowds to disperse more quickly and safely.During the show:I thought I might die of thirst!  Eventually my wife and son managed to get some water, with a 2 euro deposit on each open cup (which, because of the poor crowd control, we didn't get back -5.5 Euros is a lot of cash for a pint of water).  What a stupid idea in an arena where there's nowhere to put an open container down without somebody kicking it or dropping something into it.  Cigarette ash is bad enough but have you guys ever heard of drug safety? At least make it a cup with a lid!As a concert venue:It's awesome!Really, other issues aside' it's a great place to witness a band with as impressive a show as Rammstein's.  it has the space and the atmosphere to help bring such a spectacle to life.Would I come here again?Probably, but I'd bring a water bag (as even plastic bottles are forbidden???) and would stay outside of town and drive in as car-parks aren't any further than the U-Bahn stations.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wonderful and stunning visit!
text: The Olympiapark München in Munich, Germany, is an Olympic Park which was constructed for the 1972 Summer Olympics. Located in the Oberwiesenfeld neighborhood of Munich, the Park continues to serve as a venue for cultural, social, and religious events, such as events of worship. It includes a contemporary carillon.

title: Память об Олимgиаде~72

title: Встреча с друзьями в Баварии.
text: Посещение "Блошиного рынка" переросло в посещение телебашни, с которой открываются прекрасные виды на город по всем направлениям. Обозревая город с высоты мы обратили внимание на водоёмы Олимпийского парка, увидели с высоты большое количество разных водоплавующих птиц и очень много крупных рыб, которые в основном крутились возле берегов, ожидая корма от людей, отдыхающих на берегу. Спустившись с телебашни, мы с большим удовольствием покормили рыб и птиц, наблюдая их сражения за корм, затем продолжили прогулку по парку. Очень понравилось.

title: RELAX

title: Olympic History
text: I was very excited to visit the Olympic park and take a swim in the pool. It’s great to remember that sporting heroes were once here. The Olympic park is a great place to walk. It’s a heritage site and a classic piece of sporting memory. Really recommend walking here. It’s impressive to see where the athletes stayed, get a grand view of the complex and appreciate how Munich is structured.

It is particularly worth climbing the artificial hill (made from the rubble of World War Two) to get a view over the wider area of the park, as well, as the city and The Alps.

title: Quando le Olimpiadi sono una ricchezza permanente!

Arricchito da laghetti artificiali che sono il paradiso delle enormi carpe che guizzano fuori dall'acqua, delle anatre, dei cigni che riempiono la coreografia. Suggestiva la salita sulla torre olimpica ed il meraviglioso panorama sottostante! Una meraviglia dell'efficienza tedesca. Villaggio costruito nei primi anni 70 ed ancora vissuto con grande intensità e gioia!

title: Sightseeing stop

The Olympic pool was under refurb so no entry. The stadium was closed and there was a lot of stalls being set up for a bike show, so was limited to walk along the lake, coffee and sandwich at the restaurant. Coffee was from a machine you operated yourself n sandwich ready made from a display 🤨😟

title: Abwechslungsreich und natürlich gestaltet

title: ミュンヘンオリンピック事件をきちんと記憶している場所です。
text: 10年程前にミュンヘンオリンピック事件についての本を読み、ミュンヘンに行った際には必ず訪問したい場所だと思っていました。ドイツは、ナチスドイツを含め、歴史をきちんと認識するための展示が多い国だと思いましたが、このオリンピア公園もその1つでした。ミュンヘンオリンピック事件の犠牲者追悼プレートだけではなく、犠牲者一人一人の写真や説明、また、当時の事件の様子を大画面で動画再生している場所があり、設備に資金投資をして、過去の事件を風化させない努力をしていると感じました。そして、スポーツを政治に利用してはいけないと、深く思いました。公園自体もすごく広くて、散策にはすごく良い場所でした。

title: nice place with good architecture
text: beautiful project done by pritzker winning architect. Located a bit far from the city center but definitely worth visiting for sure. it is also located very close to the Olympic village built for the Munich Olympic game. You can take the metro and just go there from the city center. A few minutes walk after getting off the Metro. Collectively these two projects presents to you an brutality kind of aesthetics. However, I did not really see many good restaurant around the place except there are a few at the ground floor of the public housing. I remembered  there are a few cafe and a Chinese restaurant which i did not try So in a nut shell you do not have a variety to choose from.  So you may want to plan the trip time wisely to make sure you can go back to town to have dinner/ lunch. 由普利兹克获奖建筑师完成的精美项目。距离市中心有点远，但绝对值得一游。它也非常靠近为慕尼黑奥运会建造的奥运村。您可以乘坐地铁前往市中心。下车后步行几分钟。这两个项目共同为您呈现了一种残酷的美学。不过，除了公共场所底层有几间餐厅外，我并没有真正看到周围有很多好餐馆。我记得有一些咖啡馆和一家中餐馆，我没试过。所以在坚果壳里你没有多种可供选择。因此，您可能需要明智地计划行程时间，以确保您可以回到城镇吃晚餐/午餐。

title: Sembra appena costruito

text: Neither of us were born when the Olympics were held here and we only knew a little about these games butc thought it would be fun to see the old stadium and go up in the tower. Was easy to get to on the u bahn and a short walk. It was a nice walk around the park and interesting to see how the stadiums have been kept. It was very quiet when we went and it felt a little eery - like an abandoned site after a zombie apocalypse. We didn't go into the stadium as it started raining but could get close and see inside. We then ate in the restaurant at the base of the tower (good food and drinks at good prices) before going up the tower. This was probably the best bit as we got some great views (hampered by the rain and cloud so could have seen a lot more). The open top floor was very windy so we didn't stay on that long but was a great viewing spot. The rock museum at the top is part of the ticket but is tiny - though they had a few nice items. Was a nice trip for a walker that also wants some views and a bit of sporting history.

title: Auch nach fast 50 Jahren immer noch ein besonderes Münchner Highlight
text: Das Olympiagelände begeistrert nach fast 50 Jahren auch heute noch fast alle Besucher. Wenn Sie mit der U- Bahn zum Olympigelände kommen dürfen Sie auf der Wegstrecke die "BMW- Erlebenis- Welt" mit etwa 3 Mio Besucher jährlich keinesfalls auslassen. Diese "Welt" ist mit dem Olympiagelände und dem BMW Zylinder eine zeitlose und weltweit anerkannte archtitektonische Meisterleistung. Auch vom Parkplatz lohnt sich der kurze Ausflug über die Fußgängerbrücke, zumal auch die Gedenkstätte des Olympia- Attentats von 1972 sehr lehrreich ist.Die Aussicht vom Olympiaturm (Gebühr für Fahrstuhl) ist bei schönem Wetter grandios. Das Essen im Olympiaturm- Drehrestaurant ist durchschnittlich gut und erwartungsgemäß relativ teuer (meist ausgebucht -ggf  sind wie bei der BMW Erlebniswelt Tischreservierungen notwendig).Meist können Sie tagsüber die Sportstätten wie das Olympia -Stadion, - Halle, - Schwimmhalle (Badehose nicht vergessen) besichtigen oder an einer  der vielen Events teilnehmen (evtl. Kartenreservierung). Bei schönem Wetter gibt es vor allem am Olympiaberg schöne SItz- und Liegeflächen (Decke mitnehmen) und wenn SIe etwas Glück haben, findet gerade ein Feuerwerk oder das nahegelegene sommerliche "Tollwood" mit seinem Biofood, vielen Verkaufsständen und sehr guten Veranstaltungen statt.

When I asked about lack of Disabled facilities, I was told the Venue was built in the 70's.Then post show departure, pouring rain, taxis were NOT Allowed to come to door,I was TOLD, you had to go in search DOWN the road, 11:30pm,unfamiliar area, in POURING Rain, with ZERO help from venue staff. TOTAL DISREGARD, ZERO COMPASSION, for a disabled tourist.1 Hour in the rain,looking, waiting, HOPING, for a taxi. Taxis, further down the road, being taken by others, someone going by us, picked us up in his taxi, God bless him.ELO was Awesome. I spoke to some of ELO staff, I was told, this show, at this venue, was very different from the rest of the tour, not in a positive way. Our stay, in Munich was 4 days.For the able body person, there is much to do.For persons with disabilities, this is NOT, a friendly city.

text: Prachtig park. En wat een mooie sportgebouwen met een rijke historie. Je kunt je voorstellen dat Bayern nu in een ander stadion voetbalt. De zitplaatsen bevinden zich ver van het veld. Maar de indeling is wonderschoon. Zelfs de kaartjeshokjes en toilettten zijn kunst. Must see voor iedereen die wil weten waar Nederland een voetbaltrauma haalde, maar ook haar grootste succes in ‘88.

title: Trotz seines hohen Alters immer einen Besuch wert.
text: Ob ein Besuch auf dem Olympiaturm, ein Konzert in der Olympiahalle, zum Beispiel Shakira oder andere Welt Stars Der Olympiapark ist immer einen Besuch wert, man kann Bildchen fahren oder einfach nur durch die Grünanlagen schlendern im Sommer gibt es ein Riesenfeuerwerk. Viele Events Messen und Ausstellungen sowie sportliche Angebote. Eigentlich ist immer was geboten Olympiapark selbst Eis laufen Sport Events und der Zieleinlauf bis München Marathons im Olympiastadion. Die einzigartige Architektur,begeistert immer noch viele Menschen aus aller Welt. Ein Höhepunkt ist der Ausblick vom Olympiaturm, bei gutem Wetter kann man die Alpen sehen, ein fantastischer Ausblick

title: Toller Ort für Veranstaltungen und Freizeit

Wer einfach nur entspannen oder joggen gehen möchte, findet hier auch gute Möglichkeiten. title: Stands as a model of how an Olympic Park should be
text: Incredible history here. The Olympic Grounds of Mark Spitz, Olga Korbut, Vasily Alekseyev, Frank Shorter and so many others. With Jim McKay calling the events on ABC Sports. Then the Israeli athletes taken hostage with tragic results. The grounds display how proper planning developed venus and housing that are still in use today. Today it is an area of parks, sports, entertainment, education and memorial.If you watched the 1972 Olympics you will be amazed how well the place looks. If you a did not watch it then you will learn about them.

title: Schon 46 Jahre her und immer noch beindruckend...
text: Als junger Architekt hat man 1972 die Gebäude der olympischen Spiele besichtigt. Natürlich war das Stadion das absolute "Highlight" dieser gesamten Anlage.  Die Stadt München wurde durch die Architektur auf die Landkarte gebracht hat die Gebäude haben im Ausland  für Furore in den Architektenkreisen gesorgt. Das  unglaubliche ist dass auch heute noch, nach über 40 Jahren, dieses Bauwerk beindruckt und den Besucher überwältigt. Während die meisten Stadien der Olympischen Spiele in anderen Ländern verfallen so ist dies wohl das beste Beispiel hervorragender Architektur die Ihre Architekten und alle Architekturtrends über die Jarhrzente überlebt.

Toll ist natürlich auch, dass u Tee andrem das Olympiastadion und die Olympiaschwimmhalle noch immer genutzt werden.

text: Olympiapark is a good mix between the history of the 1972 olympics and a park for the whole family to enjoy. According to the website you could pay to walk on your own in the main stadium (not part of a tour), but we could not find where the tickets can be purchased. title: Excellent Park
text: A great place to explore the Olympic park, ponds and buildings.   A quick trip to the top of Olympiaturm provided me with limited view of the city because of the weather, but I was still able to see enough of the city to be able to plan what to see next on my adventures.I would recommend visiting the park in the Spring/Summer/Fall and on a clear sunny day to get a great view of Munich.

title: Tower, Rock and Roll and BMW
text: This is  the tallest viewpoint in Munich. It is next to the BMW museum/showroom complex. So do both at the same time.  The tower offers a 360 degree view from its two level observing platform. the upper level has an outdoor wrap around viewing area. The lower level is fully enclosed and includes a rock and roll museum with a room and a few walls of rock and roll artifacts. The views are good but the main Munich city attractions are far away and actually had to pick out. The Olympiapark is immediately before you and this is an easy way to see it all quickly. Definitely the park has a past glory feel to it.  The structures have a very distinctive aerodynamic German look. If this were a lone attraction I wouldn't spend time or money but since it is next to the BMW museum complex I think it is worth an hour to see all together

title: Best park in Munich!
text: The visit to Olympic Park was definitely one of the best parts of my trip to Munich! I made it there on a sunny afternoon and had a lovely time enjoying the street food, having a walk in the surrounding park and just chilling. I did not go up the Olympic Tower, but I still got some great views as the park has a lot of hills that offer you a great perspective on all the sport facilities and the entire city. And although the Olympic Games were held in Munich in 1972, the stadium and the other venues still look quite modern and are absolutely worth seeing. Last but not least, the BMW Welt, BMW Museum and the legendary BMW Tower are just on the other side of the street, so you can spend a whole day in this part of Munich. You shall certainly not regret it!

There is a small  aquarium to visit and lakes to walk and cycle around. For a few euros you can go inside the Olympic stadium which has a sureal feel when totally empty and as we were the only two in the entire stadium at the time we visited it was a really strange feeling to remember the history of this vast and beautiful structure.

Quasi non ci si crede che sia stato ideato quasi 50 anni fa. Il parco e le strutture che ospita sono molto ben curati, si può passeggiare in tutta tranquillità in questa bellissima area verde non distante dal centro. Consiglio assolutamente di salire in cima alla Torre Olimpica, in pochi secondi con il veloce ascensore si giunge ad un piano completamente chiuso, e facendo un'ultima rampa di scale si accede alla terrazza circolare da cui si può ammirare una magnifica vista della città e, in caso di giornata limpida, delle alpi.

title: Sempre piacevole visitarlo

Stadio, piscina ecc sono dei piccoli grandi capolavori di architettura che hanno fatto la storia per la loro bellezza. C'è anche uno spazio verde molto curato per rilassanti passeggiate. title: Porn for engineers
text: Built as a testimony to German engineering, this entire park summaries Munich. Clean, tidy and built to last. It was a cold autumn day and I took the tram to Olympic Park-west. From there it’s a 1.1km walk to the tower so bring suitable shoes. The tower is like any other around the planet except you’re visibility is impacted by the smog. Definitely worth the effort.

text: We walked into the park and we were disappointed as there was very little going on.  We don't know if this was just a bad time of the day that we decided to go or if there is just  not much to see. They had vendors selling stuff at their booths but not many were open.  So people told us that all you see is a big swimming pool if you take the tour. We decided not to go in as I think that they charged to look.  I can't remember but we were being told by different people that it was not worth it.  Hopefully it was because we chose the wrong day.

title: Wir wohnen hier
text: Nicht nur weil wir im olympischen Dorf leben, lieben wir den Olympiapark. Eine große, grüne, aber total urbane freie Fläche mitten in der Stadt. Wo hat man das schon? Man kann das Flair der olympischen Spiele 72 noch überall erahnen, im Sommer gibt es einen Haufen Veranstaltungen. Für Freizeitsportler ist der Olympiapark immer toll, auch im Winter- asphaltiere Wege ermöglichen Jogging, Rolerblading, radeln und Roller fahren ohne Matsch am Schuh. Der Olympiaberg und -turm geben an schönen Tagen einen wundervollen Blick über die Stadt frei! Besuchen!

title: Bela paisagem!!

title: Stupendo
text: Ho voluto a tutti i costi andare a visitare il villaggio dove si sono svolte le Olimpiadi nel 1972 che seppur ragazzino ricordo molto bene. La struttura è ancora tenuta perfettamente, con tantissimi spazi verdi e passeggiate in bici o a piedi. Lo stadio è davvero imponente e incredibile per la struttura di copertura e per come è tenuto sù. Percorrendolo nella suo sommità mi è sembrato di rivivere i momenti emozionanti che questo stadio ha visto.

title: Zona verde creada para las olimpíadas de 1972
